title: Autodesk Mudbox 2016 – Digital painting and sculpting software
content: Mudbox digital painting and sculpting software provides 3D artists with an intuitive and tactile toolset for creating and modifying 3D geometry and textures.   Features   Sculpting Falloff options 3D sculpt with Volume or Surface Falloff modes.   Relax Brush Even out spaces between vertices with minimal change to the original mesh.   Twist for […]

title: GarageBand 10.1 – Complete recording studio and more
content: The new GarageBand is a whole music creation studio right inside your Mac — complete with keyboard, synths, orchestral and percussion instruments, presets for guitar and voice, an entirely redesigned sound library, and virtual session drummers. title: BlueStacks App Player 0.9.21 – Run Android applications on your Mac
